actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-423.
Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-648.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of a report of the Senate Special Committee on the Termination of the National Emergency.

summary.text: Provides that there be printed for the use of the Senate Special Committee on the Termination of the National Emergency five thousand additional copies of its report to the Senate entitled "Emergency Powers Statutes: Provisions of Federal Law Now in Effect Delegating to the Executive Extraordinary Authority in Time of National Emergency."

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of a report of the Senate Special Committee on the Termination of the National Emergency.
